    • Method Detail

      • isOwner

        public boolean isOwner(Vehicle vehicle,
                       Function function)
        Description copied from class: AbstractController
        This gets called when the role corresponding with the function has the READ_MINE/UPDATE_MINE/DELETE_MINE/CREATE_MINE action of the resource. It should determine whether the function is the "owner" of the object.
        Specified by:
        isOwner in class AbstractController<Vehicle>
        Parameters:
        vehicle - object that should be checked
        function - the user field of function will be used to determine if the user is the owner
        Returns:
        true if the user is authorized to perform an action on the object if it has *_MINE rights.

      • getFiltered

        public java.util.Collection<Vehicle> getFiltered(java.lang.String licensePlate,
                                                 java.lang.String vin,
                                                 java.lang.Integer year,
                                                 Fleet fleet,
                                                 Customer customer,
                                                 VehicleType type,
                                                 java.lang.String brand,
                                                 java.lang.String model)
                                          throws DataAccessException,
                                                 UnAuthorizedException
        Retrieve all vehicles, filtered on the arguments. If an argument is null, it will be ignored
        Parameters:
        licensePlate - licensePlate of vehicle contains the pattern licensePlate
        vin - vin of vehicle equals the pattern vin
        year - production year of vehicle equals the pattern year
        fleet - only return vehicles of this fleet, if the fleet does not exist in the database, an empty list will be returned
        customer - only return vehicles of this customer, if the fleet does not exist in the database, an empty list will be returned
        type - vehicleType of vehicle equals the pattern vehicleType
        Returns:
        All Vehicles, filtered on arguments
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Something went horribly wrong with the database
        UnAuthorizedException - Function is not authorized to get all the objects.
